00001 !==============================================================================!
00002 ! MODULE: output 
00003 !
00008 
00009 module output
00010 
00011   implicit none
00012   private
00013   public :: print_heading,write_output
00014 
00015 contains
00016 
00017 !===============================================================================
00018 ! PRINT_HEADING
00021 
00022   subroutine print_heading()
00023 
00024     use global, only: VERSION_MAJOR,VERSION_MINOR,VERSION_RELEASE
00025 
00026     ! local variables
00027     character(len=10) :: today_date
00028     character(len=8)  :: today_time
00029 
00030     ! write header
00031     write(*, FMT='(/9(A/))') &
00032   & ' .d8888b.  888                        888b     d888  .d8888b.    ',       &
00033   & 'd88P  Y88b 888                        8888b   d8888 d88P  Y88b   ',       &
00034   & 'd88P  Y88b 888                        8888b   d8888 d88P  Y88b   ',       &
00035   & 'd88P  Y88b 888                        8888b   d8888 d88P  Y88b   ',       &
00036   & ' "Y888b.   888  .d88b.  888  888  888 888Y88888P888 888          ',       &
00037   & '    "Y88b. 888 d88""88b 888  888  888 888 Y888P 888 888          ',       &
00038   & '      "888 888 888  888 888  888  888 888  Y8P  888 888    888   ',       &
00039   & 'Y88b  d88P 888 Y88..88P Y88b 888 d88P 888   "   888 Y88b  d88P   ',       &
00040   & ' "Y8888P"  888  "Y88P"   "Y8888888P"  888       888  "Y8888P"    '
00041 
00042     ! Write version information
00043     write(*, FMT=*)                                                            &
00044  &    '     Developed At:  Massachusetts Institute of Technology'
00045     write(*, FMT='(6X,"Version:",7X,I1,".",I1,".",I1)')                        &
00046  &        VERSION_MAJOR, VERSION_MINOR, VERSION_RELEASE
00047 
00048     ! Write the date and time
00049     call get_today(today_date, today_time)
00050     write(*, FMT='(6X,"Date/Time:",5X,A,1X,A)')                                &
00051  &      trim(today_date), trim(today_time)
00052 
00053 
00054     ! write out divider
00055     write(*,FMT='(A/)') '------------------------------------------------------'
00056 
00057   end subroutine print_heading
00058 
00059 !===============================================================================
00060 ! WRITE_OUTPUT
00063 
00064   subroutine write_output()
00065 
00066     use global, only: time_init,time_run,tal,n_tallies,ana_kinf_mean,          &
00067    &                  ana_kinf_std,col_kinf_mean,col_kinf_std
00068     use hdf5
00069 
00070     ! local variables
00071     integer                        :: i            ! loop counter
00072     integer                        :: error        ! hdf5 error
00073     integer(HID_T)                 :: hdfile       ! hdf5 file
00074     integer(HID_T)                 :: dataspace_id ! dataspace identifier
00075     integer(HID_T)                 :: dataset_id   ! dataset identifier
00076     integer(HID_T)                 :: group_id     ! group id
00077     integer(HSIZE_T), dimension(1) :: dim1         ! vector for hdf5 dims
00078     integer(HSIZE_T), dimension(2) :: dim2         ! matrix for hdf5 dims
00079     character(11)                  :: talnum       ! tally number
00080 
00081     ! write results header
00082     write(*,'(/A,/,A,/)') "Results","-----------------------"
00083 
00084     ! write timing information
00085     write(*,100) "Initialization time:",time_init%elapsed
00086     write(*,100) "Transport time:",time_run%elapsed
00087     write(*,*)
00088 
00089     ! format for time write statements
00090 100 format (1X,A,T25,ES10.4," seconds")
00091 
00092     ! write k-inf information
00093     write(*,101) 'k-inf (analog):',ana_kinf_mean,ana_kinf_std
00094     write(*,101) 'k-inf (coll):',col_kinf_mean,col_kinf_std
00095     write(*,*)
00096 
00097     ! format for kinf write statements
00098 101 format(1X,A,T25,F7.5,1X,'+/-',1X,F7.5)
00099 
00100     ! open up output hdf5 file
00101     call h5fcreate_f("output.h5",H5F_ACC_TRUNC_F,hdfile,error)
00102 
00103     ! begin loop around tallies to write out
00104     do i = 1,n_tallies
00105 
00106       ! get tally number
00107       write (talnum, '(I11)') i
00108       talnum = adjustl(talnum) 
00109 
00110       ! open up a group
00111       call h5gcreate_f(hdfile,"tally_"//trim(talnum),group_id,error)
00112 
00113       ! write mean
00114       dim2 = (/size(tal(i)%mean,1),size(tal(i)%mean,2)/)
00115       call h5screate_simple_f(2,dim2,dataspace_id,error)
00116       call h5dcreate_f(hdfile,"tally_"//trim(talnum)//"/mean",H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE&
00117      &                ,dataspace_id,dataset_id,error)
00118       call h5dwrite_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,tal(i)%mean,dim2,error)
00119       call h5sclose_f(dataspace_id,error)
00120       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00121 
00122       ! write standard deviation 
00123       dim2 = (/size(tal(i)%std,1),size(tal(i)%std,2)/)
00124       call h5screate_simple_f(2,dim2,dataspace_id,error)
00125       call h5dcreate_f(hdfile,"tally_"//trim(talnum)//"/std",H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE &
00126      &                ,dataspace_id,dataset_id,error)
00127       call h5dwrite_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,tal(i)%std,dim2,error)
00128       call h5sclose_f(dataspace_id,error)
00129       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00130 
00131       ! only write energy edges if a user tally
00132       if (.not.tal(i)%flux_tally) then
00133 
00134         ! write tally data to file
00135         dim1 = (/size(tal(i)%E)/)
00136         call h5screate_simple_f(1,dim1,dataspace_id,error)
00137         call h5dcreate_f(hdfile,"tally_"//trim(talnum)//"/E",H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,&
00138        &                 dataspace_id,dataset_id,error)
00139         call h5dwrite_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,tal(i)%E,dim1,error)
00140         call h5sclose_f(dataspace_id,error)
00141         call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00142 
00143       end if
00144 
00145       ! close the group
00146       call h5gclose_f(group_id,error)
00147 
00148     end do
00149 
00150     ! close the file
00151     call h5fclose_f(hdfile,error)
00152 
00153   end subroutine write_output
00154 
00155 !===============================================================================
00156 ! GET_TODAY
00159 
00160   subroutine get_today(today_date, today_time)
00161 
00162     character(10), intent(out) :: today_date
00163     character(8),  intent(out) :: today_time
00164 
00165     integer       :: val(8)
00166     character(8)  :: date_
00167     character(10) :: time_
00168     character(5)  :: zone
00169 
00170     call date_and_time(date_, time_, zone, val)
00171     ! val(1) = year (YYYY)
00172     ! val(2) = month (MM)
00173     ! val(3) = day (DD)
00174     ! val(4) = timezone
00175     ! val(5) = hours (HH)
00176     ! val(6) = minutes (MM)
00177     ! val(7) = seconds (SS)
00178     ! val(8) = milliseconds
00179 
00180     if (val(2) < 10) then
00181        if (val(3) < 10) then
00182           today_date = date_(6:6) // "/" // date_(8:8) // "/" // date_(1:4)
00183        else
00184           today_date = date_(6:6) // "/" // date_(7:8) // "/" // date_(1:4)
00185        end if
00186     else
00187        if (val(3) < 10) then
00188           today_date = date_(5:6) // "/" // date_(8:8) // "/" // date_(1:4)
00189        else
00190           today_date = date_(5:6) // "/" // date_(7:8) // "/" // date_(1:4)
00191        end if
00192     end if
00193     today_time = time_(1:2) // ":" // time_(3:4) // ":" // time_(5:6)
00194 
00195   end subroutine get_today
00196 
00197 end module output
